articles.author: Khanyiso Tshwaku
articles.title: Door remains open for Faf, but fitness, T20 priorities a concern for Walter
articles.description: Proteas white-ball coach Rob Walter said former limited-overs captain Faf du Plessis still has an open door to the national team, but will have to understand the different workload requirements needed for 50-Over cricket.
articles.content:
• Proteas white-ball coach Rob Walter said former limited-overs skipper Faf du Plessis remains a selection option even though there are certain considerations at play.

articles.title: What we learned from watching the 1992 World Cup final in full again | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.description: Wides, lbw calls, swing - plenty of things were different in white-ball cricket back then | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.content: Last week, we at ESPNcricinfo did something we have been thinking of doing for eight years now: pretend-live ball-by-ball commentary for a classic cricket match. We knew the result, yes, but we tried… [+6823 chars]
